name: tasky
description: Yet another but refreshing todo app with gamification

scripts.build-js-libs: uglifyjs node_modules/mdbootstrap/js/jquery-3.3.1.min.js node_modules/mdbootstrap/js/popper.min.js node_modules/mdbootstrap/js/bootstrap.min.js node_modules/mdbootstrap/js/mdb.min.js node_modules/riot/riot.min.js node_modules/riot-route/dist/route+tag.min.js node_modules/idb/build/iife/index-min.js node_modules/flatpickr/dist/flatpickr.min.js node_modules/flatpickr/dist/l10n/de.js -o js/libs.js
scripts.build-all-libs: npm run build-js-libs & npm run build-css-libs
scripts.start: npm run build-all-libs & npm run watch
scripts.create-publish-structure: mkdir publish publish\js publish\css publish\font publish\images publish\webfonts publish\components
scripts.copy-to-publish: cp -r ./js ./publish && cp -r ./css ./publish && cp -r ./font ./publish && cp -r ./webfonts ./publish && cp -r ./images ./publish && cp ./index.html ./publish && cp -r ./components ./publish
scripts.publish: npm run clear-publish && npm run create-publish-structure && npm run copy-to-publish
